name: Space-X Ploration
description:
Explore this procedurally generated universe searching for resources in the planets, gathering everything you can! Avoid blackholes, destroy comets, flee from supernovas, and be careful with the mysterious nebulae!

Controls InputActionW or UpThrustS or DownBreakA/D or Left/Right
Rotate Left/Right
SpacebarShoot Lasers!
Goal

This is a score attack game, do as much points as you can by prospecting from planets and destroying comets.

Credits

Guilherme Oliveira from @Enumox

Henrique Campos from @Pigdev
